g-0: ^Oh there you are! I was hoping you'd find me out here.
^You’re a ghost too? Am I a ghost?
g-1: ^Oh, don’t worry. We haven’t been ghosts for that long.
^When! I was just a human!! I don’t wanna be a ghost. I liked being a human. Will I get to stop being a ghost soon?
g-2: ^The train crashed when you were asleep. i dont think anyone on here is still alive. not even you. thats when we got separated. I know its hard, but, the important thing is that we’re still together. You’ve been so brave. I love you.
^Can ghosts even feel love? Do Ghosts feel anything at all???
g-3: ^Well you're feeling something right now, aren't you?
^I'm finding that ghosts can feel quite a lot of love.
g-4: ^We can eat ghost ice cream. and ghost ice cream always stays cold.
^My junior parapsychology kit didn’t say anything about that.
g-5: ^I’m glad you liked my present, but I don’t think you need it anymore.
